activities: We have one facility in Europe (Poland) and in the process of an additional one (in Romania) whose employee data is listed in our SAP ERP system which in on a server located in our main US data center in Indiana.  Hard copy data files for employees are located at the plant facility.  We also have one employee in Ireland and one in the UK that are not tied to a plant location whose personnel files are located at our corporate headquarter location in the US in Indiana.
industrysector: Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)Electronic Components - (ELC)Electrical Power Systems - (ELP)Medical Equipment - (MED)
personaldata: employee, supplier, visitor - most all processed manually in country of facility location
privacyprograms: self regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities - United States Council for International Business
